thread.section_title: American Advisors Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Advisors Group | americanadvisorsgroup.com
thread.title: Diane
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Diane

author: Diane
title: Diane
text: people were pleasant and efficient, however felt the paperwork seemed endless. always needing more and more paperwork mailed or faxed. otherwise was happy with the results. the only real problem was the way the closers wrote up the final papers prompting a week long wait for the final signing.
